name: RUN FOR MONEY (Canceled)
blurb: RUN FOR MONEY is a 3rd person, single player and team co-op thievery game in an open city with thrilling stealth and action gameplay.

rewards.reward: A big THANK YOU for even the smallest support you give us. We will add your name into our small "Supporter's Money Bag" inside the explorable vault on the games website. \r\n\r\nYou also receive login credentials to our supporter\u2019s only community section, where you\u2019ll be kept up to date with our progress.

You get some of your Money back ;-) No not really, but you get a postcard depicting a thankful RUN FOR MONEY player team. Attached to that postcard you will find three 5 Swiss Francs chocolate coins.\r\n\r\nYou also get access to the community forums and your name will be placed in the larger Money Bag in our explorable vault. (which you may need, because our chocolate is quite addictive).
SUPER SAVER EARLY BIRD - The same as reward #4 but only for a limited amount of backers.

DIGITAL DOWNLOADBLE COPY of the finished game only. This to a special price, only available during the Kickstarter Campaign.\r\n\r\nYou will find your name on the list for all digital supporters on a computer desk, standing in the middle of our explorable vault.

STANDARD DIGITAL PACKAGE - Includes the finished game, the map of the city as a PDF, plus your minimap will show interesting places and minigames earlier than in in the previous reward.

From this level on, you get a key to the beta programm. 

Your name will be placed in the exploarable vault like in reward #4.

NAME A MINOR STREET - Get a chance to name one of the minor streets in the city. As the player moves through Tanestown, the name of the street he/she enters is getting displayed. Furthermore the street's name could be mentioned in a mission.\r\n\r\nIncludes the STANDARD DIGITAL PACKAGE from the previous tier.
NAME A MAJOR STREET - It is the same as reward #6, but of course the street is bigger and you get more chance that your street name will be used in any of the missions.

BOXED EDITION - A nicely designed DVD containing the finished game together with a printed manual.\r\nIt is  the same as reward #5, but in physical form including one additional digital download of the game.
DIGITAL COLLECTOR'S EDITION - \r\nYou get a digital copy of the collector's book and the city map.\r\nIncludes four additional Digital Downloads of the finished game.

COLLECTOR'S EDITION -  The collectors Book comes as a high quality printed hardcover. Beside that you get a Run For Money Polo-Shirt, a print of our city map, the game in physical form as mentioned in reward #8 and three digital downloads of the game.

NAME THE BRIDGE plus help us designing it. The large bridge connecting the industrial area and the city center of Tanestwon is a huge landmark and will be seen by thousands of players.\r\n\r\nIncludes the COLLECTOR'S EDITION.

RUN FOR MAYOR - We will design a campaign poster of you or after your specification. Give us a slogan for the campaign, why you think the current mayor is not doing enough against crime in Tanestown. Throughout the game your posters will appear in the city.\r\n\r\nIncludes one COLLECTOR'S EDITION.

BECOME A CITIZEN, Give us a 2 photos of your head (Front, Side) and we will recreate it in 3D and place in on a body type you wish. Your character gets then placed in a citizen pool and as the player walks through the city, a random number of any of those citizens characters get spawned and walk around.\r\nIncludes one Collector's edition plus 5 digital downloads.

BECOME A HISTORICAL STATUE in Tanestown. You certainly get a special place and every player will be looking up to you.\r\n\r\nIncludes one collectors edition as in reward# 10 plus 10 additional Digital Downloads of the finished game.

BECOME AN STORY RELEVANT NPC - We have a set of NPCs that appear in the story line. As you might guess from the previous rewards, on of them is the current mayor who was to defend himself against the accusations made by his rivals for the upcoming election.

Uppon conclution of this campaign, you will be contacted by us and we coordinate which Backer becomes which character. Basically it counts who comes first.

Includes one COLLECTOR'S edition 10 addition digital download to spread around your friends.

You get a chance decide upon a mission of your choice and we try to follow your guidelines as good as possible. You get to be a fully animated character that introduces the player(s) to the mission's target.\r\n\r\nIncludes on collector's edition and 10 additional Digital Donwload to spread the game around your friends and family.
